name: Comfy
author: Cobray
description: A Red cog that interfaces with ComfyUI's workflow API, allowing optional caching of workflows and simple commands to add or run them.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Comfy Cog! Use `[p]help comfy` for details.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store personal data beyond user-defined workflow names and definitions.
